lead_paragraph: The agency’s commissioners mostly split along state lines when they voted on two proposals for raising the pay scale, frustrating employees’ yearslong push for what they consider a living wage.

headline.print_headline: Campaign to Raise Minimum Wage at the Port Authority Hits an Impasse
headline.main: Wage Campaign at Port Authority Hits an Impasse

snippet: The agency’s commissioners mostly split along state lines when they voted on two proposals for raising the pay scale, frustrating employees’ yearslong push for what they consider a living wage....
abstract: Commissioners for Port Authority of New York and New Jersey anger vocal crowd of unionized airport workers when they split along state lines in vote over two competing proposals that would raise minimum wage for workers at three airports serving New York City and its metro area; neither proposal received enough votes to pass, leaving workers frustrated in yearslong push for what they consider living wage.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
